name: PixelMagic
changelog:
• fixed kernel/techpack merge issue
  • fixed UDFPS icon tint on light theme
  • added "Shake gestures"
  • added "QS pull down with one finger"
  • added new "Circle to search" implementation
  • added "Hide QS on secure lockscreen"
  • improved UDFPS dimming credits to @PowerX_NOT
  • Settings: sorted some preferences and added missing description
  • Launcher3: default recents opacity is set to 0
  • Launcher3: improved restart logic
  • Magic: updated some icons
notes:
• Magicxavi also maintains RisingOS, crDroid 10, PixelMagic 14 and YAAP.
  • KSU is included in this build, since users voted to include it, so be careful if dirty flash while using magisk.
  • Bugs: Portrait and night mode in miui camera, and Voice recognition for "OK Google" not working, Maybe more
  • Use the latest boot.img from notes.
  • Thanks to all my contributors :)
